main

Class ServerSideClientIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.ServerSideClientIO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ServerSideClientIO
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This Class handles the sending and receiving of data. On the server side of things. This class contains the following methods: A constructor, run, receiveData, and sendData

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.net.Socket clientSocket
      A ClackServer object used as the server the client is communicating with
      private boolean closeConnection 
      private ClackData dataToReceiveFromClient
      A boolean to tell whether the connection is closed
      private ClackData dataToSendToClient
      A ClackData Object for the data being received from the client
      private java.io.ObjectInputStream inFromClient
      A ClackData object for the data that needs to be sent to the client
      private java.io.ObjectOutputStream outToClient
      A ObjectInputStream object to receive data from the client
      private ClackServer server
      ObjectOutputStream object to send data off to the client

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerSideClientIO(ClackServer server, java.net.Socket clientSocket)
      Constructor for ServerSideClients takes the following two arguments, and sets there corresponding instance variables equal to them, and sets the rest of the instances variables to either false or null.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void receiveData()
      This method reads the data in from the client using the inFromClient ObjectInputStream object and and reads in the data into the dataToReceiveFromClient ClackData object.
      void run()
      Gets the object output and input streams of the client from 'clientSocket', and contains a while loop that runs as long as the connection is open.
      void sendData()
      This method sends the data out to the client using the outToClient ObjectOutputStream object and and gets the data the needs to be sent from the dataToSendToClient ClackData object.
      void setDataToSendToClient(ClackData dataToSendToClient)
      This method is mutator that sets the instance variable dataToSendToClient to the variable passed as an argument to this method.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerSideClientIO

        public ServerSideClientIO(ClackServer server,
                          java.net.Socket clientSocket)
        Constructor for ServerSideClients takes the following two arguments, and sets there corresponding instance variables equal to them, and sets the rest of the instances variables to either false or null.
        Parameters:
        server - A ClackServer object that is the server that the client is talking to.
        clientSocket - A Socket object that represents the client that is taking to a server.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Gets the object output and input streams of the client from 'clientSocket', and contains a while loop that runs as long as the connection is open. In the loop, the method calls 'receiveData()' to get data from the associated client (which is in ServerSideClientIO.java) and calls 'broadcast()' in the 'this.server' object to broadcast the data from the associated client to all clients. The 'broadcast()' method in the server will in turn call the 'sendData()' method of each ServerSideClientIO object used in threading to send broadcast data to each client. This will enable all clients to receive the data sent from any particular client.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • receiveData

        public void receiveData()
        This method reads the data in from the client using the inFromClient ObjectInputStream object and and reads in the data into the dataToReceiveFromClient ClackData object.

      • sendData

        public void sendData()
        This method sends the data out to the client using the outToClient ObjectOutputStream object and and gets the data the needs to be sent from the dataToSendToClient ClackData object.

      • setDataToSendToClient

        public void setDataToSendToClient(ClackData dataToSendToClient)
        This method is mutator that sets the instance variable dataToSendToClient to the variable passed as an argument to this method.
